EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_London_MeetUps_Q418.Confirmation Nov22
EmailTemplate.subject: You're confirmed for the Meetup!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Securing Microservices with Spring and PCF Meetup on Thursday, November 22 at Pivotal London <[[https://pivotal.io/locations/london]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email at preay@pivotal.io <[[mailto:preay@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/London_meetup_Nov22.html]]>
